failedGeolocation.title: Can't determine your geolocation
failedGeolocation.description: Perhaps you are denied access to geolocation, or the weather service does not supply weather for this place

region.title: Region
region.autoDescription: The region is determined automatically by your location, click here to change it
region.manualDescription: Region set manually, click here to change it

failed.title: Can't find your location
failed.description: Enter the name of the place to set the region manually, or try turning on geolocation

notFound.title: Place not found
notFound.description: Try changing your request and try again

failed.title: Search error
failed.description: Something went wrong, please try again later

notDetected.title: Region not defined
notDetected.description: Failed to determine the region, please try to select it manually

about.title: About extension
about.description: Write to the developer, send a bug report

review.title: Write a review
review.description: Tell us what you want to see in the application, what you like or dislike

bugReport.title: Report bugs
bugReport.description: Tell me what problems in the application are encountered, I will try to fix them as soon as possible

betaBanner.title: The extension is in beta testing
betaBanner.description: Help the extension get better, if you have ideas or spot a problem, please let me know

category.emptyDescription: There are no tabs associated with this category.

antiAliasing.label: Smoothing

firstView.prepareAppDoneDescription: The application is under testing and active development, I would like to hear about all the problems you face, as well as all your ideas for development. You can tell in the application settings in the "about application" tab. Thank you very much)

newVersion.title: New version {{version}}
newVersion.description:
The extension has been updated, now it is even better

  - Fixed critical issues

request.title: How do you like Rigami?
request.description: Take a short survey, it won't take more than a couple of minutes. This will help me understand what to focus on in the further development of the project.

end.title: Thanks for your input
end.description: Your answers will help me make Rigami better
